property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: A service member greeting a Pakistani counterpart

note.text: When beginning a meeting, it's customary to stand when others enter the room. Greet elders or superior officers first, then greet participants in descending order of authority.
You will remain standing while chatting for several minutes, until your counterpart invites you to sit. Keep both feet on the floor and a straight posture when seated.
